data.message: I'm coming here to comment because I've made a report for help 5 times with no response. I can't play any videos on Facebook at all. I'm on my phone and can play videos on any other app, but whether it's an ad, live stream, or post, no videos have played for over a week now. Can somebody please help me fix this? I just want to be able to use my account normally.

replies.message: Hi Amanda. We want to help solve the problem as quickly as possible. Please learn how to report the issue here: http://bit.ly/2zkT2jc. -Tenaya
I specifically said in my comment that I've reported it 5 times already. You haven't responded to any of them in over a week. Please just help me.
